ISSUE.TITLE: PayPal Commerce plugin. Duplicated migration version
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80 See [this comment](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/7350#issuecomment-2539090970) PayPalCommerce plugin has two migrations [AdvancedCardsMigration](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Plugins/Nop.Plugin.Payments.PayPalCommerce/Data/AdvancedCardsMigration.cs) and [SchemaMigration](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Plugins/Nop.Plugin.Payments.PayPalCommerce/Data/SchemaMigration.cs) with the same time in the NopMigration attribute which results in a duplicate version and ultimately an inability to install or update the plugin

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7450 PayPalCommerce plugin. Duplicate of migration version
